resources.post: Delighted to see Simcha Jacobovici and the old crew on a TV series– been a long time—!!! Thanks to the intelligence of the executives of the Science channel for this series. Simcha always presents the most well thought out information backed by research he has done himself. I am a Christian and I have learned more from him than I have from my own years of study in my churches..
resources.title: Science Channel’s new Biblical Conspiracies series
